mapper.select: SELECT tm.study_idx, tm.title, tm.content, tm.display_status, tm.display_start, tm.display_end, tm.`like`, tm.reg_date ,tm.image, tm.hashtag, tm.field, tm.share_people FROM tbl_mystudy as tm WHERE tm.study_idx = #{study_idx}
SELECT ts.share_idx, ts.receive_id, tm.name, ts.study_idx FROM tbl_share as ts inner join tbl_member as tm ON ts.receive_id = tm.user_id WHERE ts.study_idx = #{study_idx}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ts.study_idx) FROM tbl_mystudy AS tm INNER JOIN tbl_share AS ts ON tm.study_idx = ts.study_idx

SELECT tm.study_idx, MAX(tm.title) AS title, MAX(tm.display_status) AS display_status, MAX(tm.display_start) AS display_start, MAX(tm.display_end) AS display_end, MAX(tm.`like`) AS `like`, MAX(tm.reg_date) AS reg_date, MAX(ts.receive_id) AS receive_id, MAX(ts.share_id) AS share_id FROM tbl_mystudy AS tm INNER JOIN tbl_share AS ts ON tm.study_idx = ts.study_idx
GROUP BY tm.study_idx order by reg_date desc LIMIT #{page_skip_count}, #{page_size}
